Title: Quick Meeting
FlavourText: You have been attacked! Get everyone on the same page.
Description: Draw 2 cards.

Title: Virtual Meeting
FlavourText: Lets meet to talk about this.
Description: Draw 3 cards and discard 1 of them.

Title: Weekly meeting
FlavourText: Lets talk about it during our weekly meeting.
Description: Shuffle 1 card from your hand into the deck. Draw 2 cards.

Title: Emergency meeting
FlavourText: They are breaching our system!
Description: Add your hand to the deck and shuffle it. Then draw 5 cards.

Title: Training
FlavourText: Basic training lets your workers go over the fundamentals and new techniques.
Description: Use any 2 meeples to target 3 cards in your hand and decrease their meeple cost of a color of your choosing by 1.

Title: Network restore
FlavourText: Patch and fix your network after an attack.
Description: Restore 1 Network point to one of your facilities.

Title: Physical restore
FlavourText: Patch and fix your financial system after an attack.
Description: Restore 1 Physical point to one of your facilities.

Title: Financial restore
FlavourText: Patch and fix your security system after an attack.
Description: Restore 1 Financial point to one of your facilities.

Title: Harden New Servers
FlavourText: Buy new servers and swap out all of their default names and passwords for new ones.
Description: Restore 1 Physical; Network; and Financial point to your Sector.

Title: Enhance Encryption
FlavourText: Patch and fix the encryption of your server after an attack.
Description: Restore 1 Financial and Network point to one of your facilities.

Title: Review Access Privilege
FlavourText: Review who should have access to what to prevent people from having access to too much.
Description: Restore 1 Physical and Network point to one of your facilities.

Title: Defense in Depth
FlavourText: Create multiple layers of defense to protect against incoming attacks.
Description: Fortify one of your facilities.

Title: Hire Cybersec Expert
FlavourText: Best to hire a professional in a dire situation.
Description: Fortify and restore 1 network point on 2 facilities in your sector.

Title: Threat Hunting
FlavourText: Try connecting isolated attacks in the system to figure out where the backdoor to your system is before it gets worse.
Description: Choose 2 of your facilities to remove Backdoor from.

Title: Friendly Restore
FlavourText: Come together when needed.
Description: If the Doom clock is active you can target an allied facility if not then target one of your facilities. Restore 1 Physical; Network; and Financial point on the targeted facility.

Title: Tech Support
FlavourText: Defend each other to stop a crisis.
Description: If the Doom clock is active you can add the Fortified effect to an allied facility.  If not then you can add the Fortified effect to one of your facilities.

Title: Antivirus Deployment
FlavourText: Find a purge the virus in the system.
Description: Remove an effect on 1 facility. This card can target an allied facility as well if the Doom clock is active.

Title: System Overhaul
FlavourText: Sometimes its best to do a complete overhaul to purge any and all threats already in your system.
Description: Remove all backdoor effects on your sector and restore 1 Physical; Network; and Financial point to your Sector.

Title: Install Skiff
FlavourText: Protect your physical devices.
Description: The facility this is played on cannot lose physical resistance points for 3 turns

Title: Closed Circuit
FlavourText: The network is temporarily completely closed off from outside sources.
Description: The facility this is played on cannot lose network resistance points for the next 3 turns.

Title: Freeze Accounts
FlavourText: All monetary accounts are temporarily locked due to threat.
Description: The facility this is played on cannot lose financial resistance points for the next 3 turns.

Title: Backtracing
FlavourText: Trace the problem back to the source.
Description: Reduce the weeks left by 2 for every backdoor present in the sector.

Title: Hard Bluff
FlavourText: The authorities are very close to catching the cyberterrorists! At least that's what they want you to believe.
Description: The weeks left are divided by 2. After two turns have passed the weeks left are multiplied by 2.

Title: Hire White Hat
FlavourText: A white hat hacker can help you detect vulnerabilities - current or future.
Description: If a backdoor is present on the facility reduce the weeks left by 2 and remove the backdoor. Otherwise increase the network points of the facility by 2.

Title: Place Honey Pot
FlavourText: Setting up a trap for the hackers.
Description: For the next 3 turns if a red player plays a card on this facility; the effect of that card is canceled and they are forced to discard a card.

Title: Update software
FlavourText: Update software in order to get newer and faster ways to break encryption.
Description: Draw 2 cards.

Title: Update methods
FlavourText: Constantly changing and adapting.
Description: Draw 3 cards and discard 1 of them.

Title: Phishing
FlavourText: Someone got an email that looked a bit weird and clicked on it.
Description: Reduce 1 Network and Financial point of a facility.

Title: Denial of Service
FlavourText: Wreck their servers and prevent them from having any access to it.
Description: Reduce 2 Network points for each facility with a Backdoor in a Sector.

Title: Keylogging
FlavourText: Monitor their every keystroke.
Description: If a facility has a Backdoor; reduce 1 Physical and Network point per turn from the targeted facility.

Title: Backdoor injection
FlavourText: Inject their servers with trojans and other viruses to get their data and passwords.
Description: Reduce 1 Network point from and add a Backdoor effect for 3 turns from a facility.

Title: Physical Attack
FlavourText: Cut their cameras and security system.
Description: If a facility has a Backdoor; reduce 2 Physical points from the targeted facility.

Title: Brute Force
FlavourText: Lets go with the good ol' fashion way.
Description: Add a Backdoor effect to all facilities in a sector. Backdoors last for 3 turns.

Title: MITM - Attack
FlavourText: They are trying to talk; lets intercept them!
Description: If a facility has a Backdoor; reduce 2 Financial points from the targeted facility.

Title: SQL Injection
FlavourText: Lets tamper with their security a bit through this code!
Description: Remove 1 effect from play.

Title: Lateral Movement
FlavourText: We're in; lets move through the network.
Description: If a facility has a Backdoor; add Backdoors to all facilities in the connected Sectors. These new Backdoors last for 3 turns. You can only play 1 Lateral movement per turn.

Title: Call Bluff
FlavourText: It's bait. They have no idea where we are.
Description: Cancels the Hard Bluff effect.

Title: Plant Leaker
FlavourText: Our man is in.
Description: Converts all Fortify effects across the sector into Backdoors.

Title: Lay Low
FlavourText: Reduce activity until the heat blows over.
Description: Weeks left go up every round instead of down. This effect lasts until a facility is attacked.

Title: Aggression
FlavourText: There is no longer any need to be covert.
Description: For the next 3 turns the red team has 2 extra colorless meeples but the weeks left go down by 2.

Title: Hurricane
FlavourText: Hurricanes can cause water damage and destroy things that are critical to your network.
Description: All sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 4 then all facilities within that sector lose 1 physical point.

Title: Train Derailment
FlavourText: Train derailment can cause financial issues as the movement of cargo is slowed down.
Description: All sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 2 then the transmission facility within that sector loses 2 financial points.

Title: Fatberg
FlavourText: People have to clean up this mess you know?
Description: Water sector rolls a die. If they roll under a 5 then reduce the amount of black and purple meeples the water sector is able to use by half for 2 turns.

Title: Strike
FlavourText: The workers are upset again.
Description: All sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 3 then they lose 1 meeple of each color for 2 turns.

Title: Raw Sewage
FlavourText: Raw sewage has accidentally gotten into the pipes.
Description: Water and Health sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 3 then all of their facilities lose 2 physical points.

Title: Wind Storm
FlavourText: Wind storms can knock down trees; telecom poles; and disrupt energy systems.
Description: Energy and Communications sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 5 then all of their facilities lose 1 physical points.

Title: Ice Storm
FlavourText: Ice storms can knock down telecom poles and damage important energy sites.
Description: Energy and Communications sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 4 then all of their facilities lose 2 physical points.

Title: Drought
FlavourText: Droughts can cause massive damage to multiple sectors and states.
Description: Energy; Water; Healthcare; and Agriculture all roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 3 then all of their facilities lose 1 physical and financial point.

Title: Tornado
FlavourText: A tornado can cause severe damage to anything in its patch.
Description: All sectors roll a die for each facility in their sector. If a facility rolls under a 2 then it loses 2 financial points and all physical points.

Title: Heat Wave
FlavourText: A heat wave is a silent killer.
Description: Water; Energy; Transport; and Healthcare sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 3 then all of their facilities lose 1 physical points.

Title: Algae Bloom
FlavourText: Algae blooms can contaminate water systems easily.
Description: Water and Health sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 5 then all of their facilities lose 1 physical points.

Title: Fed and State Relief
FlavourText: The government decided to give relief to its sectors in light of recent attacks.
Description: All sectors gain 1 meeple of each color.

Title: Emergency budget infusiion
FlavourText: The government decided to increase the budget of its sectors. You now get to hire more people of your choosing.
Description: All sectors gain 2 meeple of their choice.

Title: State of emergency
FlavourText: State of emergency requires people to work more.
Description: All sectors regain 1 overtime charge.

Title: New Management
FlavourText: Sometimes new management is needed to see the issues in a new light.
Description: All sectors add 5 random cards from their discard pile into their deck.
